item.title: Infrastructure as a Service
item.description: What is Infrastructure as a Service What is Infrastructure as a Service ↓ A Cloud Computing Service Model Provides computing resource (e.g. servers, storage, networking) over the internet Offers most controls, as user manage OS, application and data Features of IaaS ↓ High scalability and flexibility Pay-as-you-go pricing models for compute power, storage and bandwith Ideal for business that want to avoid cost and complexity of owning physical infrastructure Uses of IaaS ↓ Hosting websites and application Big data analytics and storage Disaster recovery and backup .
